to 3 Years\",\"type\":\"and\",\"conditions\":[{\"adx.id\":0,\"attribute\":\"apptrack_experiencelevel\",\"operator\":\"ge\",\"value\":\"0\"},{\"adx.id\":0,\"attribute\":\"apptrack_experiencelevel\",\"operator\":\"le\",\"value\":\"3\"}]},{\"adx.id\":1,\"attribute\":\"apptrack_experiencelevel\",\"adx.uiname\":\"3-5 Years\",\"type\":\"and\",\"conditions\":[{\"adx.id\":0,\"attribute\":\"apptrack_experiencelevel\",\"operator\":\"ge\",\"value\":\"3\"},{\"adx.id\":0,\"attribute\":\"apptrack_experiencelevel\",\"operator\":\"le\",\"value\":\"5\"}]},{\"adx.id\":2,\"attribute\":\"apptrack_experiencelevel\",\"adx.uiname\":\"5+
